title: Brick Lane - Chanu and his daughters

content.question: The interaction between Chanu and his daughters in the sixth paragraph (“He turned...window”) serves to

choices.label: show Chanu’s impatience for exciting events to happen
suggest that Chanu is more affectionate toward his daughters than toward Nazneen
illustrate a contrast between Chanu’s two daughters
foreshadow Chanu’s encounter with the conductor

content.answer: illustrate a contrast between Chanu’s two daughters
